data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Necaxa are in shooting range from this free kick.
Necaxa push forward at Estadio Victoria and Juan Delgado gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined America defence.
In Aguascalientes, Necaxa push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 5, Throw-in America.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Victoria.
Federico Vinas scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 6, Great play from Ruben Gonzalez to set up the goal.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Victoria.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 14, Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a throw-in for America, close to Necaxa's area.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick for America in their own half.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of America.
Free kick Necaxa.
In the minute 17, Juan Delgado (Necaxa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Necaxa's Martin Barragan has been booked in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 18, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
America to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 21, Martin Barragan (Necaxa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 24, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the home team a throw-in.
Lucas Passerini (Necaxa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
America have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Necaxa attack but Lucas Passerini's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Throw-in America.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America.
In the minute 28, Necaxa needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
America have a dangerous throw-in.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of America.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 31, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a America throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Necaxa a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for America at Estadio Victoria.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
David Cabrera is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 35, David Cabrera is back on the pitch.
Necaxa's Juan Delgado gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 36, Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
Necaxa to take a throw-in in America territory.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lucas Passerini for Necaxa who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Victoria.
Lucas Passerini is back on his feet again.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for America in the half of Necaxa.
Free kick for America in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Necaxa throw-in in America's half.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Necaxa's Idekel Dominguez breaks free at Estadio Victoria. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to America.
Bruno Valdez (America) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards America a goal kick.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Important block from the Necaxa defence as Federico Vinas fires in a strike for America.
America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Victoria.
Martin Barragan (Necaxa) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Juan Delgado (Necaxa) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Free kick Necaxa.
Sebastian Caceres for America has been booked by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo and receives a first yellow card.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 48, Lucas Passerini (Necaxa) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by America defenders.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Necaxa.
Luis Reyes (America) gets a yellow card.
Lucas Passerini scores from the spot and Necaxa draw level at Estadio Victoria.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 54, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the home team a throw-in.
In Aguascalientes America drive forward through Sebastian Cordova. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Necaxa surge into the attack at Estadio Victoria but Juan Delgadoâ€™s header is off-target.
America have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Throw-in for America close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of America.
Miguel Herrera is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Victoria with Henry Martin replacing Antonio Lopez Amenabar.
America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 62, Santiago Caseres is replacing Ruben Gonzalez for the away team.
In the minute 63, Martin Barragan of Necaxa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 65, Throw-in high up the field for America in Aguascalientes.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 68, Luis Alfonso Sosa (Necaxa) is making a first substitution, with Maximiliano Salas replacing Martin Barragan.
Free kick America.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lucas Passerini.
In the minute 71, Lucas Passerini for Necaxa is back on the field again.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America.
In the minute 73, Ricardo Chavez is booked for the home team.
America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
America's Federico Vinas attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Corner awarded to America.
America push upfield and Federico Vinas gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Necaxa defence.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Necaxa.
In Aguascalientes, Lucas Passerini (Necaxa) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America just outside Necaxa's area.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
The home team replace Joao Rodriguez with Alex Zendejas.
America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
America to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
In the minute 83, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Free kick for America in their own half.
Throw-in for America in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 86, Play has been interrupted briefly in Aguascalientes to check on Lucas Passerini, who is grimacing with pain.
Free kick for America in the half of Necaxa.
Lucas Passerini returns to the field for Necaxa after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 87, At Estadio Victoria, Lucas Passerini has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Claudio Baeza (Necaxa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a America throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
America drive upfield and Leonardo Suarez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Necaxa defender.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Throw-in America.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Necaxa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside America's half?
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Luis Alfonso Sosa (Necaxa) has taken off Lucas Passerini who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Mario De Luna is the replacement.
The home team have replaced Juan Delgado with Jose Cobian. This is the fourth substitution made today by Luis Alfonso Sosa.
Leonardo Suarez is on a sub for Richard Sanchez for America.
Unai Bilbao is booked for the home team.
